channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former Speaker Nancy Pelosi will not seek reelection
item.description: A shrewd political strategist, California Rep. Nancy Pelosi has had an unprecedented career in Congress. First elected in a special election in 1987, ...

item.title: Bird flu surges among poultry amid a scaled back federal response
item.description: Migrating wild birds are spreading the virus to domesticated flocks, increasing the risk of eventually seeing a human outbreak. Scientists are trouble...

item.title: Trump urges GOP to end shutdown. And, SCOTUS skeptical of reasoning behind tariffs
item.description: President Trump calls on Senate Republicans to end the government shutdown. And, the Supreme Court hears arguments on whether Trump overstepped his au...

item.title: AI steps in to detect the world's deadliest infectious disease
item.description: There's a global shortage of radiologists. Now artificial intelligence is helping speed up the diagnosis of tuberculosis in hard-to-reach communities.

item.title: The federal government is still shut down. Here's what that means across the country
item.description: The federal government remains shut down, in what is now the longest shutdown in U.S. history. Reporters from the NPR Network are digging into the way...

item.title: Typhoon Kalmaegi slams into Vietnam after killing scores in Philippines
item.description: Typhoon Kalmaegi battered the Philippines, killing scores of people before moving on to Vietnam, and there's another potential monster storm brewing a...

item.title: Man held after cars in German city found smeared with swastikas in blood
item.description: Cars, walls and postboxes were defaced, in what appeared to be human blood.

item.title: Peloton recalls 833,000 more exercise bikes over faulty seat post
item.description: Peloton said seat posts on some of its original fitness bikes can break, raising the risk of rider injuries.

item.title: FAA says it will list airports where it is reducing flights during the government shutdown
item.description: The Federal Aviation Administration is expected to list where it plans to scale back flights by 10% starting Friday. The agency says it will release d...

item.title: Trump wants South Africa out of the G20 as it gears up for world summit
item.description: The US leader has repeatedly accused South Africa of persecuting its white minority - which Pretoria denies.

item.title: UPS plane's cockpit voice recorder, data recorder recovered from crash site
item.description: Investigators have recovered the UPS plane's cockpit voice recorder and flight data from the site of Tuesday's deadly crash. CBS News' Nicole Valdes h...

item.title: Officials scour charred site of Kentucky UPS plane crash for victims and answers
Typhoon Kalmaegi hits Vietnam after killing at least 114 in Philippines
item.description: More than 260,000 soldiers are on standby for rescue efforts as winds of up to 92mph (149km/h) hit Vietnam.

item.title: The remains and stories of Native American students are being reclaimed from a Pennsylvania cemetery
Cowboys defensive end Marshawn Kneeland is dead at 24
item.description: "It is with extreme sadness that the Dallas Cowboys share that Marshawn Kneeland tragically passed away this morning," the team said.

item.title: Trump to announce deal to lower weight loss drug prices in some cases
item.description: The deal, with Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk officials, is expected to lower the price of obesity drugs to $149 per month in certain cases, sources said.

item.title: Was climate change to blame for the strength of Hurricane Melissa?
item.description: A new study find that Hurricane Melissa's rapid intensification was six times more likely because of climate change.

item.title: Nancy Pelosi announces retirement after decades in US Congress
item.description: Pelosi made history as the first female Speaker and left an indelible mark on US politics.
